item.title: Understanding the Major Diatonic Scale
item.description: In this music theory fundamentals lesson Steve Stine explains the major diatonic scale and shows how several scales are built up step by step.

item.title: How to Memorize the Notes on the Guitar Fretboard
item.description: Erich Andreas breaks down the basic things you need to know to memorize the entire fretboard of a guitar.

item.title: Ukulele Lesson 2 - Open Chords
item.description: Justin Sandercoe's Ukulele Lesson 2 teaching the open chords: C, Cm, C7, F, Fm, F7, G, Gm, G7.

item.title: Basic Strumming Patterns for Guitar Part II
item.description: This video by Guitar Habits teaches five important strumming patterns in 4/4, 3/4 and 2/4 time.

item.title: Beginner Tutorial on How To Strum the Ukulele
item.description: A beginner tutorial by Cynthia Lin on how to strum the ukulele.

item.title: How to Sing and Play Uke at the Same Time
item.description: A tutorial by Cynthia Lin on how to sing and play the ukulele at the same time.

item.title: 5 DIY Guitar Accessories: Guitar Slide, Capo, Mute, Pick, Pick Holder
item.description: A short video tutorial by MrHardGuitar who teaches how to make Do-It-Yourself guitar accessories: guitar slide, capo, guitar mute (string muter), guitar pick and guitar pick holder.

item.title: 5 Tips To Better Picking On The Guitar
item.description: In this lesson Nate Savage gives 5 tips for better picking on the guitar.

item.title: Fingerpicking Pattern #1 in 4/4 Timing
item.description: The first fingerpicking pattern for ukulele in 4/4 timing in a series of lessons teaching different patterns by Tyler from TenThumbsPro.

item.title: Introduction to the Ukulele
item.description: Justin Sandercoe's introductory Ukulele lesson, where he shows how to tune a Ukulele, gives tips on holding it and teaches the cords C, Am, F and G, a.k.a. the '1564' chord progression.
